statements: DELETE FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK' AND available_seats < 50
DELETE FROM flight_schedule WHERE flight_id = 101 AND departure_airport = 'JFK';
DELETE FROM flight_schedule WHERE price >= 500.00 AND available_seats <= 50;
